segments.text: Mike , I can't catch up with our Chinese teacher very well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I advise you to take an additional course in some Chinese schools .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This kind of school is good at helping people to improve their Chinese .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will they recommend me the class that suits me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . You can review the lessons you have learned at school and learn something new there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . I'll tell my mother about it .
segments.speaker: S1
